formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Definition: 1 pound (avoirdupois) = 7000 gr and exactly 453.59237 g. Therefore: 1 gr = 453.59237 / 7000 g = 0.06479891 g (exact). Reciprocal: 1 g = 1 / 0.06479891 gr ≈ 15.4323583529 gr. Milligrams: 1 gr = 64.79891 mg (exact). Convert grains → grams: g = gr × 0.06479891. Convert grams → grains: gr = g ÷ 0.06479891.
